A little on me

Download my résumé

I'm a proud dad! On the weekends I'm also a photographer and love having coffee and traveling with my family.

In a nutshell, I'm candid, a deep thinker and imaginative..

Originally an industrial engineer from Lima, Perú, I’ve worked in marketing in 3M, digital marketing in an ‘Amazon clone’ and HR.

After years of feeling the need to ‘create’ and learning web development on my own, I started work in a web development agency called Laboratoria and fell into UX there. Read more on this transition here.

My approach to design

I enjoy figuring out the structure and the strategy behind building the actual system.

Design with data, qualitative and quantitative, letting it be the guide.

Focus on making interactions functional, understandable, and interesting to users.

Relevant Skills

  • Front end development (Html, CSS, SASS, jQuery)
  • Design thinking and user interviews
  • Fast learner (and love doing it)
